page.title: 01Sandgate School
page.content: { { { Sandgate School}is a special school,it caters for children with severe learning difficulties. In addition to the basic mental handicap some pupils also have physical or sensory disabilities. The building is made up of a hall,5 classrooms,a swimming pool and a cookery room. The school is government subsidised. The physiotherapy pool is used twice weekly. The school caters for 35 children and the teaching staff consists of a Head,a Deputy Head and 5 other teachers. The catchment area is the eastern part of{South Lakeland.}The school tries to get the children ready for outside life so they can look after themselves.
